MS MCQs

    Create a UI in Xamarin.Forms apps by using XAML - XAML markup extensions

    »

    1. Which Xamarin.Forms markup extension allows you to set a XAML property to a static value that’s defined in a code-behind class?

      StaticResource

      Binding

      x:Static


    2. In XAML, {x:Static} and {x:Null} are examples of ____.

      Value Converters

      Markup Extensions

      Bindings


    3. Which Interface do you use to create a custom markup extension?

      IMarkup

      IValueConverter

      IMarkupExtension
